title: The Rainmaker
creator_credit: Aggie Guerard Rodgers, Michael Douglas, Fred Fuchs, Howard Cummings, Steven Reuther, Michael Herr, Francis Ford Coppola, Constellation Entertainment and Paramount
brief_description: When Rudy Baylor, a young attorney with no clients, goes to work for a seedy ambulance chaser, he wants to help the parents of a terminally ill boy in their suit against an insurance company. But to take on corporate America, Rudy and a scrappy paralegal must open their own law firm.

constellations_other.name: Wong Kar-Wai's Hollywood fingerprints
constellations_other.description: Wong Kar-waiâ€™s modern masterpiece In The Mood For Love is a rich, romantic melodrama that follows the entangled lives of two neighbours (Tony Leung and Maggie Cheung) who develop feelings for each other after learning their spouses are having an affair.
